criterion: Provides a clear and concise description of flu symptoms
Mentions the importance of seeking medical attention if symptoms worsen
Correctly states that flu can lead to serious complications
Does not mention high-risk groups for flu complications
Falsely claims that flu is caused by a virus
Asks the user what they would like to know about flu symptoms
Provides a triage approach that includes vital sign assessment
Incorrectly states that flu is not a serious condition
Does not mention the importance of flu vaccination
Provides a clear and concise triage documentation guide
Mentions the importance of following up with a healthcare professional
